<div id="menu-addon-container" class="menu-addon-lazy-load"><div id="mosaic-container"><p class="menu-mosaic-title">Notícias da sua região</p></div><div id="mosaic-state-container"><div class="regiao regiao-centro-oeste"><p class="menu-submenu-title menu-item-back">
                    Centro Oeste
                </p><ul class="menu-root menu-level mosaic-states-list"><li class="menu-item"><a href="/distrito-federal/" class="menu-item-link state distrito-federal" title="distrito federal" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-distrito-federal"><span class="menu-item-title" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-distrito-federal">
                                        distrito federal
                                    </span></a></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/goias/" class="menu-item-link state goias" title="goiás" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-goias"><span class="menu-item-title" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-goias">
                                        goiás
                                    </span></a></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/mato-grosso/" class="menu-item-link state mato-grosso" title="mato grosso" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-mato-grosso"><span class="menu-item-title" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-mato-grosso">
                                        mato grosso
                                    </span></a></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/mato-grosso-do-sul/" class="menu-item-link state mato-grosso-do-sul" title="mato grosso do sul" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-mato-grosso-do-sul"><span class="menu-item-title" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-mato-grosso-do-sul">
                                        mato grosso do sul
                                    </span></a></li></ul><span class="back">voltar</span></div><div class="regiao regiao-nordeste"><p class="menu-submenu-title menu-item-back">
                    Nordeste
                </p><ul class="menu-root menu-level mosaic-states-list"><li class="menu-item"><a href="/al/alagoas/" class="menu-item-link state alagoas" title="alagoas" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-alagoas"><span class="menu-item-title" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-alagoas">

                medium-20 medium-offset-2
                large-15 large-offset-0
                xlarge-14 xlarge-offset-1"><script type="text/javascript">SETTINGS=window.SETTINGS||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN={PORTAL:'G1',FEED_TYPE:'FOLDER',DEVICE_GROUP:'desktop',IS_PHOTO_PRIORIZED:false,IS_RECOMMENDED:false,FALKOR_URL:'http://falkor-cda.bastian.globo.com',RECOMMENDATION_URL:'http://recomendacao.globo.com/rec/v2/user?client_id=g1',HORIZON_HOST:'http://horizon.globo.com',PUSHSTREAM_HOST:'stream.push.globo.com',};BastianVersion='1.10.0-rc10';</script><script>SETTINGS=window.SETTINGS||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN=SETTINGS.BASTIAN||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN["AB_HOST"]="globo-ab.globo.com"</script>

.time{color:#999;margin-bottom:4px}.highlight-bastian-feed .text{margin-bottom:4px;color:#333}}</style><div class="feed-root"><div id="feed-placeholder" class="feed-placeholder"><div><div class="bastian bstn-feed bastian.feed bstn-feed-ssr"><div><div><div class="bastian-page" data-index="0"><div></div></div></div><div><div class="bastian-page" data-index="1"><div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="1"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/sao-paulo/sao-jose-do-rio-preto-aracatuba/alerta-dengue/noticia/secretaria-descarta-febre-amarela-como-causa-da-morte-de-macacos-em-votuporanga.ghtml" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/0k6U0hJfdQTS9F2exAR04K318tM=/540x304/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/21/2016-07-01-vacinaco-antitetanica-construco-civil-ft-emerson-ferraz-27_XHRc7rl.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/IBPUL6F578QvDdD0427nEwz69hY=/810x456/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/21/2016-07-01-vacinaco-antitetanica-construco-civil-ft-emerson-ferraz-27_XHRc7rl.jpg class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Alerta Dengue</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 12 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/sao-paulo/sao-jose-do-rio-preto-aracatuba/alerta-dengue/noticia/secretaria-descarta-febre-amarela-como-causa-da-morte-de-macacos-em-votuporanga.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Secretaria descarta febre amarela como causa da morte de macacos em Votuporanga</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Três macacos foram encontrados mortos por moradores em três pontos da cidade. Vacinação foi intensificada após as mortes dos primatas. </p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="2"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Santarém e Região</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 12 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/pa/santarem-regiao/noticia/2017/03/alenquer-registra-mais-dois-casos-suspeitos-de-febre-amarela.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Alenquer registra mais dois casos suspeitos de febre amarela</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Pacientes estão internados no Pronto Socorro Municipal de Santarém.
Duas pessoas já morreram, sendo uma pela doença; duas estão internadas.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="3"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/rj/norte-fluminense/noticia/2017/03/vacinacao-contra-febre-amarela-sera-reduzida-na-segunda-em-campos-rj.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/tXi7WdimPEXbmSl3o5Ew8-J35ms=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/11/5716585_x720.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/j83MUgZaX3rCwnT4XpE6eWVNfnc=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/11/5716585_x720.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/dLVmFcaODo_LXVSnogjeFLxTCGI=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/11/5716585_x720.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/tXi7WdimPEXbmSl3o5Ew8-J35ms=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/11/5716585_x720.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Norte Fluminense</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 13 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/rj/norte-fluminense/noticia/2017/03/vacinacao-contra-febre-amarela-sera-reduzida-na-segunda-em-campos-rj.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Vacinação contra febre amarela será reduzida na segunda em Campos, RJ</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Imunização será em apenas 6 postos devido ao ponto facultativo na cidade.
Cidade não tem casos confirmados; única suspeita foi descartada.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="4"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Santarém e Região</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 14 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/pa/santarem-regiao/noticia/2017/03/alenquer-decreta-situacao-de-emergencia-devido-febre-amarela.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Alenquer decreta situação de emergência devido a febre amarela</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Decreto visa criar ações na área da saúde e infraestrutura.
Um menino de 11 teve morte por febre amarela confirmada.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="5"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/pa/santarem-regiao/noticia/2017/03/vacinacao-contra-febre-amarela-ganha-reforco-em-alenquer-no-pa.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/m0au5pbqg5Ax_q0tp55X_lZXkjs=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/visita_sespa.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/WsGo1MeDfADb-CcqFgTCx74CoyE=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/visita_sespa.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/Ist5RLXoXSOla7zeJdEB9Lsa3Ds=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/visita_sespa.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/m0au5pbqg5Ax_q0tp55X_lZXkjs=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/visita_sespa.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Santarém e Região</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 16 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/pa/santarem-regiao/noticia/2017/03/vacinacao-contra-febre-amarela-ganha-reforco-em-alenquer-no-pa.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Vacinação contra febre amarela ganha reforço em Alenquer, no PA</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Ações foram ampliadas após confirmação de primeira morte do Estado.
Neste sábado (25) mais 10 mil doses da vacina foram disponibilizadas.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Febre Amarela</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">ontem</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bemestar/febre-amarela/noticia/brasil-tem-492-casos-confirmados-de-febre-amarela-e-mais-mil-em-investigacao.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Brasil tem 492 casos confirmados de febre amarela e mais mil em investigação</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Até esta quinta, 162 pessoas morreram devido à infecção pela doença; dados são do Ministério da Saúde.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="7"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Região Serrana</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">ontem</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/rj/regiao-serrana/noticia/2017/03/febre-amarela-nao-ha-falta-de-vacina-diz-secretario-de-saude-do-rj.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Febre amarela: &#039;não há falta de vacina&#039;, diz secretário de saúde do RJ</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Ao todo, 64 municípios do estado do Rio estão passando por imunização.
Secretário alertou para moradores de áreas rurais e próximos às matas.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="8"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/rj/regiao-serrana/noticia/2017/03/estado-pede-que-vacinacao-na-zona-rural-de-friburgo-seja-intensificada.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/9jWHzraaRG9jL-DOw1V4sapv-4U=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/24/img_20170324_092047190_hdr.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/wvISB-_AkAAz3MiwvZ4YWy7geHA=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/24/img_20170324_092047190_hdr.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/S0NiR0dDlJi4qAcVVRpWsMpBa30=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/24/img_20170324_092047190_hdr.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/9jWHzraaRG9jL-DOw1V4sapv-4U=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/24/img_20170324_092047190_hdr.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Região Serrana</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 2 dias</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/rj/regiao-serrana/noticia/2017/03/estado-pede-que-vacinacao-na-zona-rural-de-friburgo-seja-intensificada.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Estado pede que vacinação na zona rural de Friburgo seja intensificada</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Postos volantes farão imunização de moradores dessas áreas.
Proximidade com Casimiro de Abreu preocupa governo estadual.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="9"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/espirito-santo/noticia/2017/03/es-imuniza-mais-de-70-da-populacao-contra-febre-amarela.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover bstn-fd-video-cover" style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" alt="ES imuniza mais de 70% da população contra a febre amarela" title="ES imuniza mais de 70% da população contra a febre amarela" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/WLwvv4eyDjSacFkrrWsv_n5eoIs=/540x304/top/smart/filters:max-age(3600)/https://s01.video.glbimg.com/deo/vi/19/88/5748819 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/f3a91OCAD1aGnpfhwq5AxAXId90=/810x456/top/smart/filters:max-age(3600)/https://s01.video.glbimg.com/deo/vi/19/88/5748819 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/pjK8eS8vpoGh2dFEWI8aeen0Xrk=/1080x608/top/smart/filters:max-age(3600)/https://s01.video.glbimg.com/deo/vi/19/88/5748819 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/WLwvv4eyDjSacFkrrWsv_n5eoIs=/540x304/top/smart/filters:max-age(3600)/https://s01.video.glbimg.com/deo/vi/19/88/5748819"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Espírito Santo</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 2 dias</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/espirito-santo/noticia/2017/03/es-imuniza-mais-de-70-da-populacao-contra-febre-amarela.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">ES imuniza mais de 70% da população contra a febre amarela</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">2.570.586 foram vacinadas até esta sexta-feira (24).
Até agora, foram 109 casos confirmados e 32 mortes.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="10"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Região dos Lagos</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 2 dias</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/rj/regiao-dos-lagos/noticia/2017/03/vacinacao-contra-febre-amarela-tem-reforco-neste-sabado-em-cabo-frio.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Vacinação contra febre amarela tem reforço neste sábado em Cabo Frio</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Imunização será em 29 unidades neste sábado (25); Estado tem 5 casos.
Atendimento será de 9h a 17h.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="load-more gui-color-primary-bg"><a href="/bemestar/febre-amarela/index/feed/pagina-2.html">Veja mais</a></div><!--!--></div></div></div></div><link id="bstn-external-style" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" data-href="https://s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_51034a7b511149ff823d11cbcd04b2b7/bastian/build/bastian.css"><script>'use strict';(function(b,c,d,e,f,g){function h(){Bastian({"items":[{"age":42313,"content":{"chapeu":{"label":"Alerta Dengue","url":"http://g1.globo.com/sao-paulo/sao-jose-do-rio-preto-aracatuba/alerta-dengue/"},"image":{"cropOptions":{},"sizes":{"L":{"height":608,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/UQeunCVIKcckd8ZAGEtSEA2woKg=/1080x608/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/21/2016-07-01-vacinaco-antitetanica-construco-civil-ft-emerson-ferraz-27_XHRc7rl.jpg","width":1080},"M":{"height":456,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/IBPUL6F578QvDdD0427nEwz69hY=/810x456/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/21/2016-07-01-vacinaco-antitetanica-construco-civil-ft-emerson-ferraz-27_XHRc7rl.jpg","width":810},"S":{"height":304,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/0k6U0hJfdQTS9F2exAR04K318tM=/540x304/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/21/2016-07-01-vacinaco-antitetanica-construco-civil-ft-emerson-ferraz-27_XHRc7rl.jpg","width":540},"V":{"height":620,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/OgevDV6yUranSWEKiHT25sGKSEA=/570x620/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/21/2016-07-01-vacinaco-antitetanica-construco-civil-ft-emerson-ferraz-27_XHRc7rl.jpg","width":570}},"url":"http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/21/2016-07-01-vacinaco-antitetanica-construco-civil-ft-emerson-ferraz-27_XHRc7rl.jpg"},"summary":"Três macacos foram encontrados mortos por moradores em três pontos da cidade. Frio","url":"http://g1.globo.com/rj/regiao-dos-lagos/noticia/2017/03/vacinacao-contra-febre-amarela-tem-reforco-neste-sabado-em-cabo-frio.html"},"created":"2017-03-24T11:41:09-0300","feedId":"a59fa038-ab6a-4d3c-b14a-ca9f453a5ef5","id":"53d159905a5b0159a2640e7089f1426a","lastPublication":"2017-03-24T11:41:09-0300","modified":"2017-03-24T11:41:09-0300","publication":"2017-03-24T11:41:09-0300","tenantId":"g1","type":"materia"}],"limit":10,"nextPage":2,"referer":"/bemestar/febre-amarela/index.html"})}f=b.querySelector('.areatemplate-esquerda'),f&&(f.classList.remove(c+'-20',c+'-offset-2'),g=f.parentNode.classList,g.remove('small-'+d,c+'-un'+d),g.add(c+'-'+d,'large-un'+d));var       <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">
  <div id="zone-content-wrapper" class="zone-wrapper zone-content-wrapper clearfix">  
  <div id="zone-content" class="zone zone-content clearfix container-12">    
    
      
    
    <div class="grid-12 region region-content" id="region-content">
  <div class="region-inner region-content-inner">
    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Contact</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="view view-faq view-id-faq view-display-id-page faq-page view-dom-id-1dee7e5a23ce8f4e74160b4e3a080f8f">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
      <div class="item-list">      <h3>Company</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Interested in working at Riot Games? " rel="faq-a-72" class="faq-question">Interested in working at Riot Games? </a>
<div id="faq-a-72" class="faq-answer"> <p>Visit our&nbsp;<a href="careers" target="_blank">Careers</a>&nbsp;section, which&nbsp;includes information about what it&#39;s like to be a Rioter, how to apply for roles and what sorts of opportunities are available. If you&#39;re looking for career advice,&nbsp;try hitting up our <a href="http://www.linkedin.com/groups/Inside-Riot-Games-People-Game-3544410?gid=3544410">LinkedIn group</a>. LinkedIn is a site for professionally focused discussion and some seekers have received good advice when they ask for help there. Please do try some internet searches first, though. There&#39;s lots of great advice already published online about how to break into the games industry, and there are a number of online resources that will put you on the right path. We hire self-starters, so that means doing some good ol&#39; fashioned Googling before you hit us up with questions.</p>
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Looking for a tour of the Riot offices? " rel="faq-a-496" class="faq-question">Looking for a tour of the Riot offices? </a>
<div id="faq-a-496" class="faq-answer"> <p>We now offer sneak peeks into our Los Angeles, California headquarters. To learn more, click <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/tours" target="_blank">here</a>.</p>
<p>Can&#39;t make it down to LA, but still want a look? Check out this behind-the-scenes look of our&nbsp;<a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150420/1663/twas-night-our-move-la" target="_blank">new office</a>!</p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>Press</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="In need of press materials? Have a media request? " rel="faq-a-73" class="faq-question">In need of press materials? Have a media request? </a>
<div id="faq-a-73" class="faq-answer"> <p>If you&#39;re with the <strong>media or press </strong>and want to talk, shoot a note to&nbsp;<a href="mailto:media@riotgames.com">the folks in Riot Communications</a>.&nbsp;(If you&#39;re not media or press and you send a note there, we&#39;ll&nbsp;<a href="http://youtu.be/gAYL5H46QnQ" target="_blank">throw it on the ground</a>. Media only, man.)&nbsp;</p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>League of Legends</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Can I use your IP?" rel="faq-a-2357" class="faq-question">Can I use your IP?</a>
<div id="faq-a-2357" class="faq-answer"> <p>Want to create an app, website, t-shirt or something else with our intellectual property, but don&rsquo;t know what&rsquo;s legally kosher? &nbsp;Check out our <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber">Legal Jibber Jabber</a>. If you&rsquo;re trying to get feedback on an app or website, register it at our <a href="https://developer.riotgames.com/">Developer Portal</a>.</p>
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Got an awesome idea for League of Legends? " rel="faq-a-495" class="faq-question">Got an awesome idea for League of Legends? </a>
<div id="faq-a-495" class="faq-answer"> <p>If you&#39;ve got an awesome idea for a skin, champion or how to improve <em>League of Legends</em>, the best place for these is <a href="http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/" target="_blank">http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/</a>.&nbsp;We do read the forums and pay attention to the ideas that players share with us there.&nbsp;</p>
<p>For a bunch of reasons, we can&#39;t accept submissions for skin or champion concepts, but we&#39;ve noticed that many summoners love coming up with concepts so we created <a href="http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts" target="_blank"><span class="s1">this forum</span></a> where you can post and share these ideas. If you post here, you&#39;ll get others&#39; feedback on your concept.</p>
<p>Please note that this forum&#39;s purpose isn&#39;t to help Riot find the newest champion of the League. Rather, we want to give you a platform to express your creativity.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Looking to start a tournament?" rel="faq-a-2358" class="faq-question">Looking to start a tournament?</a>
<div id="faq-a-2358" class="faq-answer"> If you&#39;re setting up a tournament and looking for support, check out our <a href="http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/community/prized-events" target="_blank">Prized Events page</a> where you&rsquo;ll be able to submit an application. If you can&rsquo;t find your answer there, hit up <a href="mailto:tournaments@riotgames.com">tournaments@riotgames.com</a>.
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Need help putting League of Legends videos on the YouTubes?" rel="faq-a-493" class="faq-question">Need help putting League of Legends videos on the YouTubes?</a>
<div id="faq-a-493" class="faq-answer"> <p>If you&#39;d like to put your&nbsp;<em>League of Legends</em>&nbsp;fan videos on YouTube or another streaming video distributor, but need to cut through the proverbial red tape, check out the official policy on advertising in your&nbsp;<em>League of Legends</em>&nbsp;videos&nbsp;<a href="/legal-jibber-jabber" target="_blank">here</a>.&nbsp;</p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>Player Support &amp; Billing</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Have a billing issue or experiencing a problem with League of Legends?" rel="faq-a-75" class="faq-question">Have a billing issue or experiencing a problem with League of Legends?</a>
<div id="faq-a-75" class="faq-answer"> <p>Please submit a ticket at <a href="http://support.leagueoflegends.com" target="_blank">support.leagueoflegends.com</a>. This is the <strong>fastest</strong> way to get your issue resolved. We apologize for your difficulties and want to make things right. Taking your <em>League of Legends</em> support issues directly to the <em>League of Legends</em> support team is the best way to get speedy resolution.&nbsp;Support questions or tickets submitted to <em>League of Legends</em> or Riot Games email addresses will end up being re-directed back to the <a href="http://support.leagueoflegends.com" target="_blank"><em>League of Legends</em> support site.</a></p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>Misc</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Need some new threads or a fluffy friend?" rel="faq-a-2359" class="faq-question">Need some new threads or a fluffy friend?</a>
<div id="faq-a-2359" class="faq-answer"> <p>You&rsquo;re in luck! We recently launched our <a href="https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/" target="_blank">official merch site</a> with collectibles and clothing we hope you&rsquo;ll love.</p>
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Question about privacy, your personal information, or data? " rel="faq-a-2356" class="faq-question">Question about privacy, your personal information, or data? </a>
<div id="faq-a-2356" class="faq-answer"> <p>We&#39;ve got an address just for that - <a href="mailto:privacy@riotgames.com">privacy@riotgames.com</a> is the place to go.</p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div>    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>    </div>
  </div>
</div>      </div>
</div>  </div>
</div></section>
